TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DependencyPropertyDescriptor extends System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor
Public NotInheritable Class DependencyPropertyDescriptor Inherits PropertyDescriptor

summary.span: 提供用于说明依赖属性的其他属性特征的 的扩展。

span.span: Provides an extension of that accounts for the additional property characteristics of a dependency property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类主要由设计器的应用程序使用。This class is primarily used by designer applications. 这些应用程序可能需要报告通过属性窗口或其他工具用于编辑属性值的依赖项属性特征。These applications may need to report the dependency property characteristics through property windows or other tools used for editing property values. 若要检查特定的属性以确定其是否具有可充当，调用，或。In order to check a specific property to determine whether it has available to serve as a , call either , or . 如果这两种方法返回`null`，则此属性不是依赖项属性。If either method returns `null`, then the property is not a dependency property. 如果该方法返回一个有效，则此属性是依赖项属性。If the method returns a valid , then the property is a dependency property.

summary.span: 返回此 的哈希代码。

span.span: Returns the hash code for this .

returns.span: 32 位有符号整数哈希代码。

span.span: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 哈希代码基于依赖项属性标识符和其设置的类型。The hash code for is based both on the identifier for a dependency property and on the type on which it is set. 此实现确保不正确返回相同的哈希代码的多个可能的派生类，继承的属性或重新分配通过属性系统的属性。This implementation assures that a does not improperly return the same hash code for properties that are inherited by the many possible derived classes, or for properties that are otherwise re-assigned through the property system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性依赖于基础。This property relies on the underlying . 依赖关系属性注册为只读的通过特定方法调用和惯例[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]所查看的反射和描述符的属性的包装器属性必须也是只读的。Dependency properties are registered as read-only using particular method calls, and by convention the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] wrapper properties that are the properties viewed by reflection and the descriptors must also be read-only. 但是，由于这是一种约定，不是要求进行编译，你可能想要仔细检查依赖项属性标识符的只读状态。However, since this is a convention and not a requirement to compile, you might want to double check the dependency property identifier read-only state. 若要执行此操作，获取的标识符 () 值为，然后检查的值。To do this, get the identifier () value for this and then check the value of . 请注意，是关于标识符本身，而不是元数据。Note that the is on the identifier itself, not metadata.
